questions.title: What is React?
questions.content: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces.
questions.author: Alice

questions.title: How to use useState in React?
questions.content: The useState hook allows you to add state to functional components.
questions.author: Bob

questions.title: What is the use of useEffect in React?
questions.content: The useEffect hook allows you to perform side effects in functional components.
